name: Get to the Other Side of the Coin! :)
name_original: Get to the Other Side of the Coin! :)
description:
Hey everyone. 

Sorry we did not get half as much as we wanted but my 7 year old daughter wanted to make a game for the jam! So she and I put one together in the evenings! I have never made a 3d game before so :) we both learned a lot!

Spacebar: jump

wasd: movement

e: change color

q: reset color

I think she now wants to make another game, so be on the look out as we will probably make another, although we will not try to do it in a weekend!

huge shout out to the people that made the assets we used:

Platformer Starter Pack

Particle Text

Chameleon

modular RPG Heros Polyart

And I used info from here to get my splines working https://forums.unrealengine.com/community/community-content-tools-and-tutorials/...
